attributes.action: move the Special Air Service base in Credenhill, Hereford to a more secure and safe location away from Hereford City
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current SAS base in Credenhill is too exposed and open. It would be easy for terrorists to get information and spy on the site. 
With the public visiting the nearby Iron Aged Fort, it would be easy for them to spy on the base. 

Please help to get the base away from Hereford to a safer, more confidential site away from public access. Thankyou.
